#labels Phase-Implementation
 This page is for discussing how to add jSCEP to your own project using Maven.  For details     
 on how to _build_ jSCEP using Maven, see the [SourceCode source code] page.

jSCEP artifacts (including sources and javadocs) are now available from the [http://repo1.maven.org/maven2/ Maven central repository].  The dependency details are as follows:

|| groupId || *com.google.code.jscep* ||
|| artifactId || *api*, *client* or *server* ||
|| version || *1.1.1* ||

To add the jSCEP API as a dependency to your own Maven project, add the following to your `pom.xml`:

{{{
<dependencies>
    <dependency>
        <groupId>com.google.code.jscep</groupId>
        <artifactId>jscep-api</artifactId>
        <version>0.20.6</version>
    </dependency>
</dependencies>
}}}

== Repository Hosting ==

Maven repository hosting for jSCEP artifacts is provided by [http://nexus.sonatype.org/oss-repository-hosting.html Sonatype].

[http://www.sonatype.com http://jscep.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/Sonatype%20RHB.gif]
